text.autoconfig.clientsidenoteblocks.opt: Enables debug mode. This will print out debug messages in the console.
Enables the Mod. A Keybind can be assigned to this in the Keybind settings
Always Cancel Played Noteblock Server Sounds

Recommended to leave this disabled.
If enabled, this will cancel all Noteblock sounds played by the server for blocks you've interacted with (instead of just the ones we expected to receive).
This will prevent you from hearing the pitch changes of a Noteblock or sounds played by other players once you've left-clicked a Noteblock.
